    VisualCrossing Weather Forecast Plugin¶

    Contents:

    • Juham Visual Crossing Plugin

    VisualCrossing forecast plugin for Juham™¶

    Description¶

    Adds forecast support to Juham™ home automation.

    Project Status¶

    Current State: Alpha (Status 3)

    Please check out the CHANGELOG file for changes in this release.

    Getting Started¶

    ### Installation

    1. Install

      pip install juham_visualcrossing

    2. Configure

      • VisualCrossing.json: Add your Visual Crossing API key for weather forecasts.

    Changelog¶

    [0.1.7] - February 21, 2025¶

    • Changelog:

    • Minor bug fixes to plugin class visualcrossing_plugin.py.

    • pyproject.toml updated.

    • Status updated to Alpha

    [0.1.6] - February 17, 2024¶

    • Changelog:

    • Plugin class visualcrossing_plugin.py added, for automated install.

    [0.1.5] - December 26, 2024¶

    • Changelog:

    • CHANGELOG.rst and README.rst added
